page.title: 16CHANGES IN THE AREA
page.content: The Walker family moved to Newton Hall in 1965.They have seen many changes. Here is their account - "In 1965 Newton Hall was mainly farmland.Only a small number of shops existed and the Bluecoat Primary School was in the process of being built.The area contained few roads and a very limited amount of housing.Since that time the estate has mushroomed and is now one of the largest in Europe.The farmland is covered with houses and there is an extensive road system.A Church,Community Centre,Two Public Houses,Two Infants Schools,Two Junior Schools and Two Shopping Areas have all been built."
